page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: { Bulldog}is a game where one or more people are on(that means one person stands in the middle of the playground opposite a long line of children) then he calls out a persons name and that person must try and run from one side of the playground to the other without getting caught. If the person who is 'ON' calls out 'BULLDOG!'all of the people who are not 'ON' have to try and run across. In{ACKY 1,2,3}one person is 'ON' and the others run away and hide. The person who is 'ON' counts up to 100, with eyes closed. When he sees somebody he shouts 'ACKY 1,2,3 and the person name, but if they cannot see the person coming towards the ACKY POST the person that hid shouts'ACKY 1,2,3 MYSELF'
